{"name": "YMCA of Montclair", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/

What You’ll Need to Apply for SNAP Benefits

Identification (for everyone in the household, such as driver’s license, birth certificate, government ID).
Social Security Numbers (for everyone in the household).
Phone and Utility bills (gas, electric, oil, water).
Housing Costs (rent receipt/agreement, mortgage statement and/or tax bill).
Proof of Income (for everyone in the household, such as pay stubs, employer letter, tax records).
Proof of Resources (bank statements)
Medical Expenses (if 60 or older and/or disabled).
Child and Adult Care Expenses
HOW TO GET HELP
If you or someone you know is interested in learning more about SNAP, eligibility, or need help with applying, contact our SNAP outreach team:

jrose@montclairymca.org
